TopicTitle: EVE Round Trip w/ kethane = Complete Disaster? Let's find out!

Articles.Content:
Well, I did it. Finally. Sort of. Jebediah is the first Kerbal in the history of Kerbalkind to set foot on Eve with any sort of hope of actually returning home.

Please pardon my cheesy narrating, but here it is in its full 1080p glory!!

Optional, a few images to spice up the day:

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited February 27, 2014 by mellojoe

I'm bumping this in order to gather some info:

Do you all like video mission reports? I'm working on my next mission and trying to figure out if I should edit the video or just do pictures. Did you like this video? Did you just skip over it? What worked, what didn't? Pictures easier to view quickly?

I only just now saw this thread.

The video was quite good. I think with complex, multi-ship missions, you have 2 choices. Either you can break it up into a bunch of text episodes or you can do a video. Both work for me.
